original_text: After spending some time there, he departed and went from one place to the next through the region of Galatia and Phrygia, strengthening all the disciples.
korean_text: 얼마 있다가 떠나 갈라디아와 브루기아 땅을 차례로 다니며 모든 제자를 굳건하게 하니라

sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 얼마 동안 시간을 보낸 후에,

sentences.original_text: and went from one place to the next
sentences.korean_translation: 한 곳에서 다른 곳으로 옮겨 다니며

sentences.original_text: through the region of Galatia and Phrygia,
